ygData.subject: Re: Bard Instruments
ygData.msgSnippet: I just had one of those terrible thoughts has anyone tried using our identify song as part of the process of finding it?
ygData.messageBody:
I just had one of those "terrible thoughts" has anyone tried using our identify song as part of the process of finding it?

On Wed, 26 Jan 2000 12:22:02 -0700 eqbards@onelist.com wrote:
> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
> Morning Dew is in the game? That'll be great news for my guilds ranger and
> druid. They have been trying to forage some for months and have had no
> luck. They have been on the verge of giving up ever making Elven Wine. It
> must be incredibly rare since the druid has a forage of over 150 and hasn't
> found any yet. we assumed it would be like Nightfall giants and only showed
> up in the morning hours, Norrath time. Do you know if that is correct?
>
> Kit
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Perhaps a Princess... [mailto:sarah@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, January 26, 2000 12:21 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard Instruments
>
>
> From: "Perhaps a Princess..." <sarah@...>
>
> I also remember all the people who said Morning dew wasn't in
> the game. When it was -- as a rare forage.
>
> I don't know either way, myself. But mistakes have been made, even
> with lots of people going around looking for stuff.
>
> >-----Original Message-----
> >From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:Dean_Kimes@...]
> >Sent: Wednesday, January 26, 2000 11:13 AM
> >To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> >Subject: [eqbards] Bard Instruments
> >
> >
> >From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
> >
> >Well its been several months now since they were first mentioned in a
> patch >and still no one has discovered a small brass trumpet or Kelin's
> practice >Lute. I know not all bards spend as much time running around
> asking people >about quests as I do, but still given the amount of time I
> am >fairly certain
> >that if these really were in the game they would have been found
> >by now. GZ
> >insisted they really were in the game, but that we would have to look hard
> >for them. I have checked nearly every merchant outside of the evil cities
> >and the gnomes in solusek, but have had no luck. Why they would be in any
> >of those places anyhow is beyond me. Does anyone have any other ideas, or
> >is this something we need to somehow emphasize further that despite Verant
> >thinking 'It's in the game' it isn't? Certainly wouldn't be the first time
> >they were 'positive' that something was in the game when it wasn't
> >especially concerning bards. I'm sure everyone over 46 remembers the
> >scorned banshees they swore up and down were dropping Imbrued when
> >they were
> >not. Any ideas?
> >
> > Kit
> >
